link.title: MLB Scores, Standings, Box Scores for Thursday, July 26, 2018 | Baseball-Reference.com

meta.name: Description
meta.content: MLB scoreboard/standings for July 26, 2018 and historical box scores/standings on Baseball-Reference.com.
MLB Scores, Standings, Box Scores for Thursday, July 26, 2018 | Baseball-Reference.com
MLB scoreboard/standings for July 26, 2018 and historical box scores/standings on Baseball-Reference.com.

link.title: Player and Team Search

img.alt: Baseball-Reference.com Logo & Link to home page

div.div:
You are here:
BR Home Page > Box Scores<\/a> > MLB Scores, Standings, Box Scores for Thursday, July 26, 2018

div.aria-label: Site Search for players, teams and sections

input.name: search
input.aria-label: Enter a player, team or section name

div.h1: MLB Scores and Standings Thursday, July 26, 2018

select.name: year
select.option: or Go to a Season Schedule

a.strong: or View Previews for Today's Games

div.h2: Standings Up to and Including this Date

th.data-tip:
Win-Loss Percentage
W / (W + L)
For players, leaders need one decision for every ten team games.
For managers, minimum to qualify for leading is 320 games.

Games Back of Division/League Leader
Computed as games over .500 of leader (W-L) minus games over .500 of team divided by two.
Typically computed at the end of play for a particular day.
Blank for 1st game of DH.
Runs Scored
Runs Allowed

Pythagorean Win-Loss Percentage
This value is an estimate of the teams win-loss percentage
based on the runs scored and runs allowed by this team.

div.p: All logos are the trademark & property of their owners and not Sports Reference LLC. We present them here for purely educational purposes. Our reasoning for presenting offensive logos.
Logos were compiled by the amazing SportsLogos.net.
Copyright © 2000-2019 Sports Reference LLC. All rights reserved.
Much of the play-by-play, game results, and transaction information both shown and used to create certain data sets was obtained free of charge from and is copyrighted by RetroSheet.
Win Expectancy, Run Expectancy, and Leverage Index calculations provided by Tom Tango of InsideTheBook.com, and co-author of The Book: Playing the Percentages in Baseball.
Total Zone Rating and initial framework for Wins above Replacement calculations provided by Sean Smith.
Full-year historical Major League statistics provided by Pete Palmer and Gary Gillette of Hidden Game Sports.
Some defensive statistics Copyright © Baseball Info Solutions, 2010-2019.
Some high school data is courtesy David McWater.
Many historical player head shots courtesy of David Davis. Many thanks to him. All images are property the copyright holder and are displayed here for informational purposes only.
